hero.desc: From country music to trending Afro beats, plug in to the best sounds in the world.

about.entry: Catch up with your favourite podcasts. Join the conversation
about.desc: Get in on the latest trending topics from around the world

earn.desc: Get BNB for correctly predicting the top songs on MuxiFI.

defi.entry: Build the finest collections of all times
defi.desc: Curate the greatest collections of pure music & become the best collector of the year.

features.desc: Maximizing the power of blockchain technology to enhance music experience.

items.title: Moralis
items.desc: Moralis powered everything from data fetching to crunching the numbers for the Music NFTs. Moralis aided us as leverage in building the MuxiFi platform.

items.title: IPFS(NFT.storage)/Pinata
items.desc: IPFS and Pinata were used to store the NFTs and the music files. IPFS was used to store the NFTs and Pinata was pin and access the stored the music files.

items.title: BNB Chain
items.desc: MuxiFi was built on the Binance Smart Chain. The BNB Chain was used to mint the NFTs and to store the music files. This was done to reduce the gas fees and to make the platform more accessible to users.

newsletter.desc: Be the first to get the latest gist in the music industry.
